name: retry

retry verb
(LAW)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ T ] to try someone again in a court of law (= examine them to find out if they have committed a crime or not): The original jury could not come to a verdict in the case. The defendant was retried several months later and convicted of the crime.

retry verb
(MAKE NEW ATTEMPT)
